Intro

This is a game I programmed in November 2018. I used the turtle library in python. It is like a space invaders game. It only took me a week to make. My friends enjoy playing the game. It is a simple program that can be run on any of tablets that has jupyter notebook.

How to run it

  • copy the code

  • paste it in one of the python files in your jupyter notebook

  • Run the code and you should see this

Game Manual

  • You goal is to prevent the "invaders" from attacking your spaceship. You can kill one of them if your bullet hit one invader, and you get 10 points after.
  • When you hit one "invader", a new one will generate in a random place on the upper screen, and all the invaders also will move faster. You goal is to get as many as points as possible.
  • ⬅ ➡ on keyboard are for moving the spaceship left and right.
  • space is for shooting bullets, and A is for shooting super bullets.
  • Super bullet is bigger and can hit targets easier. You get one every 30 points you score.
